document_data.name: ''Amulet of Seldarine''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''amulet of Seldarine''''' was a unique [[amulet]] gifted to the adventurer [[Abdel Adrian]] by [[Ellesime]], the Queen of the [[elves]] of [[Suldanessellar]].
document_data.Powers: It offered its wearer protection from all manner of [[spell]]s and [[magic]]al effects.
document_data.History: The amulet was a commemoration of sorts for the rescue of Suldanessellar, when it was besieged by the disgraced [[elven]] [[archmage]] [[Jon Irenicus]] in the {{YearlinkName|1369}}. Abdel and his companions helped summon the avatar of [[Rillifane Rallathil]] in order to defend the sacred ''[[Tree of Life]]''.
